title: Neo Pax Sivir on EUW redeemable?
body: Heya, i send a ticket to support about my neo pax sivir to redeem the code in EUW. Somewhere it stated that  i had to send a pic with my IGN and server name on a piece of paper, together with the code. So i did and send riot supp the picture, but that was almost 12 hours ago. I came back from pax west today and i really want to play with the sivir skin since im a hardcore sivir lover. Is there someone here who has to deal with the same issue? how long did it take for them to respond? also, if you're a rioter, could you help me out?

replies.body: That ticket will be the best way of getting that code redeemed since it already has all of the info we'll need to check. If you still haven't gotten a response, no worries. Sometimes the queues can get a little backed up and we might be seeing a lot of those PAX related tickets right now!
Hey there, I still haven't got an answer and the code expires tomorrow.. any chanche that I wont lose the skin?
Umm hi i think i have been waiting for my skin too i sent a ticket to riot but still no response it has been nearly 17 hours now yet no response. Can u help me with the time?
